modName: The Shoggoth new Creatures in Skyrim
summary:

descriptionHtml:
PEOPLE CAN USE THIS MOD FOR WHATEVER THEY WANT, I MADE THE CREATURES USING VINC\'S RESOURCES SO THAT YOU WOULDN\'T HAVE TO GO THROUGH THE TROUBLE OF SKINNING THEM. PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DOWNLOAD AND DO WHATEVER YOU WISH AS LONG AS YOU GIVE PROPER CREDIT. THANK YOU!



1.1.0 added a small update that gives you a reason to go to the shipwreck now. besides a fight against abunch of enemies there is now a spell tome that lets you summon a evolved shoggoth located at the shipwreck near the Crew\'s note.


This is a nice little mod that adds a new race of Creatures to Skyrim at a new location so that they don\'t mess up the rest of the game. there is a note ingame explaining how they came to skyrim so i believe it is lore friendly.
Anyways the creatures are located at a shipwreck Directly underneath of Winterhold college, there is a map marker so you can fast travel there but be ready for a fight.

                                                   Requirements

1. Dragonborn DLC, sorry but the creatures use the textures from the dragonborn DLC so its  a requirement.
2. A legal copy of skyrim                                                            

And thats it! Go download the mod and enjoy. please let me know in the comments section of any bugs, spelling errors, or tips. i might add these creatures to the leveled list as a new file but would like some feedback first. if you think they should be put in skyrim leveled list or the dragonborns apocrypha please let me know. 

                                                           Credit

Meshes provided by Vicn in from his modders resource pack here
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37413/
 
                                                     Roleplaying Tips

if you would like to pretend your the evil creator of these creatures or just like them as guards or whatever else you can think of, to make them friendly to you open the console and type
help \"Shoggoth Faction\"
then player.addtofaction xxxxxx 0
xxxxxx is the number you got in the console.
then help shoggoth
and player.placeatme xxxxxx #
where xxxxxx is the number of the version of shoggoth you want to spawn and # is how many

NOTE: the flying versions are currently in testing and are bugged they won\'t harm your game but they look wierd so you can use them and they are pretty cool but they act like ice wraiths :P
author: TheBeast505
